divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were heading home from Rice lake WI.on hwy 53 south about 2 miles from hwy 8 and in the sky I seen a heat lightning flash,soon after my wife seen an object to her right of her passenger seat about 70 feet from our car,I looked to my right and seen it flash on.The flash went so fast I asked my wife if she seen the same thing I did and she said yes. It looked close but a very long distance off at the same time.It was very confusing.Three Miles South of my sighting a friend of mine had a ship hover over his house,but he does not want anyone else to know this.2007 a lady from Chetek WI.spotted a craft on county road O North bound parallel to hwy 53 very close to my sighting, according to the Barron news paper. The following news paper said it was a weather balloon but I think it was covered up.There is a airport now where my sighting took place.
Summary: It was a perfect circle one demetion mint green glow appeared to be in another time zone, it was their but it was not
trends: There has been one other sighting in Cameron
There were no other sightings in Cameron on or around June 12th 1987
